long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding the page to edit on Contentful can be cumbersome, so we created a small utility chrome extension that allows for one-click page editing.

This is all you need to do to activate it.
1. Contentful Space ID
2. Contentful Environment Name
3. entryid should be visible in the page meta property. 

Add meta tag with content attribute and property name "entryid" to your webpage
<meta content="enter entry id here" property="entryid">
